allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS petunia_play CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "USE petunia_play; SELECT c.id, c.name, c.animal_section_id, c.parent_id, a.name as seccion FROM categories c LEFT JOIN animal_sections a ON c.animal_section_id = a.id WHERE c.is_active = 1 ORDER BY a.name, c.name LIMIT 20;")
